definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
(lit.) chest sticking to back/(fig.) famished/(of several persons) packed chest to back

sentences.english: Double jetted pockets at front and detailed pearl snap buttons.
sentences.chinese: 前胸開雙脣袋及配上珍珠鈕作裝飾。

sentences.english: Look at his chest, flooded with British and foreign medals.
sentences.chinese: 看他前胸都戴滿了國內和國外的勳章。

sentences.english: Fables logo embroidered on the front while horse graphic print at back.
sentences.chinese: 前胸有車章及後身有騎馬圖案印花。

sentences.english: Her shoulders trembled, she knocked her forehead against my chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的肩膀顫抖着，她用額頭撞我的前胸。

sentences.english: He was given a sash emblazoned with “Mr. Bear Arabia, ” and draped it over his bare chest as other men offered congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 他把肩帶披在赤裸的前胸，其它男人紛紛上前祝賀。

sentences.english: The cervix is the flexib1e region between the head and prothorax.
sentences.chinese: 頸是頭部和前胸之間可曲的區域。

sentences.english: Its fur is yellow-brown, with a darker vest and collar.
sentences.chinese: 它的毛皮呈黃褐色，前胸後背與頸項的顏色要深一些。

sentences.english: Then come over here and hold on to this, with you front flat against the plate.
sentences.chinese: 到這裏來，抓住這個，前胸緊靠到這塊板上。

sentences.english: It's already been one day and I'm really, really hungry.
sentences.chinese: 現在已經過去一天了，我真是餓得前胸貼後背了。

sentences.english: The second jet of light hit him squarely on the chest.
sentences.chinese: 另一道光正好擊中他的前胸。

sentences.english: The doctor percussed his chest and back.
sentences.chinese: 醫生叩診他的前胸和後背。

sentences.english: She wears a crystal ornament on her chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的前胸戴了一個水晶飾品。

sentences.english: Two front pockets in bias cut.
sentences.chinese: 前胸袋口以縱紋剪裁造出斜格效果。

sentences.english: If you extend through your thumbs a bit, you will feel the front of your chest open.
sentences.chinese: 如果你從大母指伸展一點，你就會感覺前胸的開闊。
箭桿插在它的前胸上，一記乾淨利落的擊殺。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
